abstract.t: At present, various security components have appeared. All thesecurity components should work together to establish a strongerdefense architecture in the future, so it is necessary for thesecomponents to communicate with each other. This document describesthe Security Components Exchange Protocol (SCXP), anapplication-level protocol for exchanging data between securitycomponents. SCXP supports mutual-authentication, integrity,confidentiality and replay protection over a connection-orientedprotocol.
